name: Uptown pizza
address: 15148 North Bluff Rd, White Rock, BC V4B 3E5, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Meat Lover
hasMenuItem.description: Pepperoni, salami, Italian sausage, ham, ground beef, bacon, tomato sauce, and cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Hawaiian Supreme
hasMenuItem.description: Extra ham, extra pineapple, and extra cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown House Special
hasMenuItem.description: Pepperoni, salami, Italian sausage, mushrooms, onions, green peppers, pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Garden Veggie
hasMenuItem.description: Onions, green peppers, mushrooms, fresh tomatoes, olives, & pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken wings available in 10 or 20 pcs. Choices of hot, BBQ, teriyaki, honey garlic, lemon pepper, sweet chili, or butter sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Up to One Topping (Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Small pizza with a choice of cheese (5 types), meat (10 types), or vegetable (9 types) topping.

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Lasagna
hasMenuItem.description: Layers of pasta, cheese, and savory meat sauce. Available in regular or large sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, moist chocolate cake with a gooey molten center.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Classic
hasMenuItem.description: Pepperoni ham, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, and olives.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Greek Special
hasMenuItem.description: Onions, green peppers, olives, ground beef, fresh tomatoes, and feta cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Large
hasMenuItem.description: Two large pizzas with choice of toppings: cheeses (5 types), meats (10 types), vegetables & pineapple. Includes two sodas: Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: Up to One Topping (Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Large pizza with choice of one topping: variety of cheeses, meats, or fresh veggie options including pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Lasagna
hasMenuItem.description: Layers of pasta, cheese, and savory meat sauce. Available in regular or large sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
hasMenuItem.description: Spaghetti in rich, meaty tomato sauce. Size options: regular, large.

hasMenuItem.name: Ravioli with Meat Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Ravioli filled, topped with a hearty meat sauce. Available in regular or large.

hasMenuItem.name: Linguine seafood
hasMenuItem.description: Medley of seafood with marinara sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Chef’s special
hasMenuItem.description: Penne, chicken, shrimp, sausage & mushrooms in rosa sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Tortellini with Meat Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Tortellini filled with savory meat, coated in a rich tomato sauce. Options for regular or large servings.

hasMenuItem.name: Linguine Carbonara
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy linguine with crispy pancetta, green peas, and grated Parmesan cheese, tossed in a rich carbonara sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Hamburger
hasMenuItem.description: Chipotle mayonnaise, lettuce, tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: House blended tomato sauce, seasoned ground beef, onions and bacon. topped with cheddar, provolone and mozzarella cheese. sprinkled with chopped dill pickles.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon Mushroom Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: Chipotle mayonnaise, lettuce, tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Chipotle mayonnaise, lettuce, tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: Chipotle mayonnaise, lettuce, tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Mushroom Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Chipotle mayonnaise, lettuce, tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Medium
hasMenuItem.description: Three medium pizzas with customizable options from a variety of cheeses, meats, and vegetables. Includes one soda choice: Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Large
hasMenuItem.description: Three large pizzas with choice of toppings: cheeses like mozzarella, proteins including chicken, beef, meats, and a variety of vegetables. Paired with Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, or Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Jumbo Deal
hasMenuItem.description: 2 medium specialty pizzas, 2 lasagnas or spaghetti, 2 garlic toast, and free garden salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Mega Deal
hasMenuItem.description: 2 medium specialty Uptown pizzas, 20 chicken wings, free 2L pop.

hasMenuItem.name: Caesar Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Classic Caesar Salad with Crisp Romaine, Parmesan, Croutons, and Signature Caesar Dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Greek Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh mixed greens, olives, feta, cucumber, and tomato in homemade dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Italian Salad for 2
hasMenuItem.description: Cucumbers, onions, olives, cherry tomatoes, & mozzarella.

hasMenuItem.name: Garden Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh garden salad tossed with a house dressing consisting of olive oil vinegar and house spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Caprese Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Tomatoes, bocconcini cheese, and balsamic vinegar.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Party Deal
hasMenuItem.description: 5 large uptown pizzas with 3 toppings, free 2L pop.

hasMenuItem.name: Pizza Pasta Night
hasMenuItem.description: 1 large specialty Uptown pizza, 2 lasagna or spaghetti, 2 garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Large
hasMenuItem.description: Two large pizzas with choice of toppings: cheeses (5 types), meats (10 types), vegetables & pineapple. Includes two sodas: Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Medium
hasMenuItem.description: Two medium pizzas with a variety of toppings including cheeses like cheddar to meats such as chorizo, and vegetables like roasted garlic. Includes a choice of Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, or Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: Family Deal
hasMenuItem.description: 1 large specialty Uptown pizza, 15 chicken wings, Caesar, Greek, or garden salad, free 2L pop.

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Medium
hasMenuItem.description: Choose any 3 pizzas from an expansive selection including house specials, meat-lover themes, vegetarian options, international flavors like Greek, Mexican, and Tandoori, to unique mixes such as chorizo sausage & goat cheese or seafood deluxe. Accompanied by a choice of Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, or Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Large
hasMenuItem.description: Choose any 3 large pizzas: options include house specialties, Italian, meat lovers, supremo, classic, Philly steak, various Hawaiian, Greek, olive, bacon burger, Sicilian, Mexican, steak mushroom burger, chorizo sausage & goat cheese, pesto shrimp, meatball, BBQ pulled pork, taco varieties, deluxe versions, tandoori paneer, BBQ steak, Alfredo, white rock, salmon, and spicy. Soda options: Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: Mozza Sticks
hasMenuItem.description: Breaded and fried mozzarella, typically served with a side of marinara sauce for dipping.

hasMenuItem.name: Onion Rings
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy battered onion rings, golden-fried to perfection.

hasMenuItem.name: Potato Skins
hasMenuItem.description: Hollowed-out potato halves filled with melted cheddar cheese, crisp bacon bits, and typically garnished with sour cream and green onions.

hasMenuItem.name: French Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Golden, crispy potato fries lightly seasoned with salt.

hasMenuItem.name: Jalapeño Poppers
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy breaded jalapeños stuffed with creamy cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Zucchini Sticks
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy zucchini sticks coated in a golden breading.

hasMenuItem.name: Texan Style
hasMenuItem.description: Baked with jalapeños, green onions, tomatoes & topped with sour cream, & southwest sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Calamari
hasMenuItem.description: Squid lightly battered and fried, typically includes a side of marinara sauce for dipping.

hasMenuItem.name: Jalapeño Popcorn Shrimp
hasMenuItem.description: Breaded shrimp tossed with diced jalapeños, typically includes a hint of spice.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken wings available in 10 or 20 pcs. Choices of hot, BBQ, teriyaki, honey garlic, lemon pepper, sweet chili, or butter sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Selection of dips: roasted garlic, ranch, chipotle cheddar, and cheesy jalapeño.

hasMenuItem.name: Up to One Topping (Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Large pizza with choice of one topping: variety of cheeses, meats, or fresh veggie options including pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Up to One Topping (Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Small pizza with a choice of cheese (5 types), meat (10 types), or vegetable (9 types) topping.

hasMenuItem.name: Up to One Topping (Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Medium-sized pizza with choice of one topping: cheese varieties, meats including bacon and chorizo, or vegetables like spinach and zucchini.

hasMenuItem.name: Up to One Topping (Half & Half) (Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Medium half-and-half pizza with a choice of any one topping on each side from cheese varieties, meats, or fresh veggies and fruits, including olives and pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Up to One Topping (Half & Half) (Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Large half-and-half pizza with a choice of one topping on each side. Options vary from cheeses, meats, vegetables, and pineapple. Ideal for custom flavor combinations.

hasMenuItem.name: Up to One Topping (Half & Half) (Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Small uptown pizza with customizable half & half topping: cheese options or meats like bacon, chicken; vegetables including peppers, onions, mushrooms; fruit option is pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Butter Chicken Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Butter sauce, chicken, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, and tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown BBQ Chicken Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Barbecue sauce, chicken, onions, jalapeño peppers, green peppers, and mushrooms.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Chipotle Style
hasMenuItem.description: Chipotle sauce, grilled chicken, sweet corn, onions, green peppers, red peppers, Cheddar, and cheese blend.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Spicy Buffalo Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Hot buffalo sauce, grilled chicken, mushrooms, red onions, red peppers, mozzarella, and Cheddar.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Pesto Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Pesto sauce, chicken, bacon, jalapeño peppers, red bell peppers.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Tandoori Chicken Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Tandoori chicken, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Chicken Club
hasMenuItem.description: Jalapeño ranch sauce, grilled chicken, Canadian ham, bacon, uncooked tomatoes, green onions, and mozzarella.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Traditional Margarita
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh tomatoes, fresh basil, bocconcini cheese, balsamic reducer, olive oil.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Spinach Veggie
hasMenuItem.description: Spinach, fresh tomatoes, artichokes, zucchini, onions, and feta.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Veggie & Goat Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Tomato sauce, mixed vegetables, and goat cheese blend.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Veggie Korma
hasMenuItem.description: Korma sauce, spinach, onions, banana peppers, tomatoes, & paneer (Indian cheese).

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Garden Veggie
hasMenuItem.description: Onions, green peppers, mushrooms, fresh tomatoes, olives, & pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Pesto Veggie
hasMenuItem.description: Pesto sauce, spinach, onions, tomatoes, feta, and Parmesan.

hasMenuItem.name: 6-Pack Pop
hasMenuItem.description: Six-pack of your choice: Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, or Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 L Pop
hasMenuItem.description: 2L soda available in Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Sierra Mist.

hasMenuItem.name: Orange Juice 1 Liter
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly squeezed from ripe oranges, this 1-liter bottle offers a refreshing and pure citrus delight.

hasMenuItem.name: Rockstar Energy Drink
hasMenuItem.description: A canned beverage designed to boost energy, typically containing caffeine, taurine, and B-vitamins.

hasMenuItem.name: Apple Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly squeezed apple nectar, packed with the tart and sweet essence of ripe apples.

hasMenuItem.name: 1 Can of Pop
hasMenuItem.description: Pepsi, diet pepsi, mug root beer, orange crush, dr pepper, mountain dew, brisk lemonade, 7 up, ginger ale, aquafina water.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Meat Lover
hasMenuItem.description: Pepperoni, salami, Italian sausage, ham, ground beef, bacon, tomato sauce, and cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown House Special
hasMenuItem.description: Pepperoni, salami, Italian sausage, mushrooms, onions, green peppers, pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Hawaiian Supreme
hasMenuItem.description: Extra ham, extra pineapple, and extra cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Greek Special
hasMenuItem.description: Onions, green peppers, olives, ground beef, fresh tomatoes, and feta cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Supremo Italian
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh pizzaiola sauce, spicy Italian sausage, capicola, pepperoni, roasted garlic, hot banana peppers, mozzarella, and Cheddar cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Classic
hasMenuItem.description: Pepperoni ham, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, and olives.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Tropical Hawaiian
hasMenuItem.description: Tropical sauce, ham, pineapple, bacon, and Cheddar.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Olive Lover
hasMenuItem.description: Green olives, black olives, pepperoni, salami, feta, and banana peppers.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Sicilian Style
hasMenuItem.description: Italian sausage, chorizo sausage, onions, tomatoes, & blended cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Hot Mexican
hasMenuItem.description: Onions, green peppers, jalapeño peppers, banana peppers, pepperoni, ground beef, and Italian sausage.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Steak Mushroom Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Cheddar sauce, steak, bacon, mushrooms, onions, and Cheddar cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Uptown Chorizo Sausage & Goat Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Salsa, chorizo sausage, onions, goat cheese, and blended cheese.

review.reviewBody: Best pizza place in the town . Great taste and pizza is very delicious .
